meanings.definition: The quality of being lively, exciting, or stimulating.
meanings.sent1: The raciness of the music got everyone dancing at the party.
meanings.sent2: I love the raciness of adventure movies that keep me on the edge of my seat.
meanings.sent3: The raciness of the joke made everyone burst into laughter.
meanings.sent4: Her raciness on the dance floor was like a burst of energy in the room.
meanings.sent5: The raciness of the roller coaster ride left me exhilarated and thrilled.

meanings.definition: The quality of being slightly spicy or tangy in flavor.
meanings.sent1: The raciness of the salsa added a kick to the dish.
meanings.sent2: I enjoy the raciness of the pepperoni pizza with its tangy flavor.
meanings.sent3: The raciness of the hot sauce made my taste buds tingle.
meanings.sent4: The raciness of the curry was like a flavor explosion in my mouth.
meanings.sent5: The raciness of the pickles gave the sandwich a zesty twist.
